meanings.definition: A type of plant belonging to the Lycopodiaceae family.
meanings.sent1: The lycopods in the garden have small leaves and produce spores.
meanings.sent2: I learned about lycopods in my science class last week.
meanings.sent3: The lycopods in the forest had a family reunion, and they all looked alike!
meanings.sent4: The lycopods spread across the forest floor like a green carpet.
meanings.sent5: The lycopods stood tall and proud, a symbol of nature's beauty.

meanings.definition: Any of various club mosses of the genus Lycopodium.
meanings.sent1: We found lycopods growing near the creek during our nature walk.
meanings.sent2: The lycopods added a touch of green to the forest floor.
meanings.sent3: The lycopods in the garden were having a dance party under the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: The lycopods swayed gently in the breeze, like dancers in a silent ballet.
meanings.sent5: As I walked through the woods, the lycopods whispered secrets of the ancient forest.
